balloon.content: The person uses their mouth to inflate it.

panel.balloon: La personne utilise sa bouche pour le gonfler.

balloon.content: Hang on, buddy! We’re almost there!

left.balloon: Accroche-toi, mon pote ! Nous y sommes presque !

balloon.content: I won't give up; I need to stay focused!

left.balloon: Je ne vais pas abandonner ; je dois rester concentré !

balloon.content: I have come to collect the lost souls

right.balloon: Je suis venu collecter les âmes perdues.

balloon.content: By the power vested in me, I command you to leave!
What have I done to deserve this fate?

left.balloon: Par le pouvoir qui m'est conféré, je t'ordonne de partir !

right.balloon: Que qu'ai-je fait pour mériter ce destin ?

balloon.content: I hope this blessing will bring peace to the restless

panel.below: In the middle is a pile of burnt feathers

balloon.content: This is strange... I feel something changing inside me

panel.below: In the middle is a pile of burnt feathers

left.balloon: J'espère que cette bénédiction apportera la paix aux insouciants.

panel.below: In the middle is a pile of burnt feathers

right.balloon: C'est étrange... Je sens quelque chose changer en moi.

panel.below: In the middle is a pile of burnt feathers

balloon.content: The dog is a small breed.

panel.balloon: Se serrer la main montre du respect.

panel.setting: lunar lander ascending from the moon
lunar lander ascending from the moon

balloon.content: I'll take a whiskey neat, please!

left.balloon: Je prendrai un whiskey sec, s'il vous plaît !

balloon.content: Mmm, this martini hits the spot!
Just made my last drop—gotta refill

right.balloon: Je viens de faire ma dernière goutte—il faut que je remplisse.

panel.below: In the middle is a pile of empty bottles

balloon.content: Just a bit more and I'll need a bigger tray!

panel.below: In the middle is a pile of empty bottles

left.balloon: Ce whiskey est de première qualité !

panel.below: In the middle is a pile of empty bottles

right.balloon: Encore un peu et j'aurai besoin d'un plateau plus grand !

panel.below: In the middle is a pile of empty bottles

right.balloon: Oh non, maintenant je suis trempé !

balloon.content: Look at me! I'm the life of the party!
Sorry, Alfie, but this isn't a circus! You've got to go

left.balloon: Regarde-moi ! Je suis le roi de la fête !

right.balloon: Désolé, Alfie, mais ce n'est pas un cirque ! Tu dois y aller.
